name: SaveOurBiomes
description:
In this game, your goal is to restore life in its full diversity in a garbage dump. You start by planting small plants, water them, then attract small animals, grow larger plants... The engine behind the game is based on real biological equations and the game shows how difficult it is to reach a sustainable equilibrium. 

The game was conceived by Polytechnique students, on an original idea proposed by the association Games for a better world, under the advice from the ScienceXGames academic chair, and with the expertise of biologist Maud Mouchet.  

Authors :  Raphaël Gardies ; Hangyu Lyu ; Perrine Mathieu ; Anouk Perreau ; Adrien Ramanana Rahary ; David Ripayre

Advisors : Raphaël Granier de Cassagnac ; Maud Mouchet ; Jehanne Rousseau
